column5: There is a camp on Arc Lake. Arc is next to Vincent which is next to Hooker

1. Slate Falls will be opening an outpost on Hooker Lake. I am booked in early July 2. Hidden Bay Lodge will now have an opening at Blackstone in early July. I am very excited to be returning to Hooker Lake. It is best lake I have ever fished and from what I read on here Slate Falls is a great outfitter. I do want to take this opportunity to thank Hidden Bay. They have been great to me and I highly recommend them. Great service, economical and great food.
When I fished with Slate Falls in August I heard some pretty amazing stories about Hooker lake. Will be interesting to see how it fishes next year.
Fished Hooker last week of July every other year for the last 10 years. Great numbers lake , but haven't caught any over 26 inches.
A big thumbs up for Hidden Bay! Great crew and equipment! They know how to put you on the fish, and know how to provide outstanding customer service!

I would give Blackstone an edge over Hooker on size. For me Hooker has produced better numbers by a substantial amount. I do have one 28 incher from Hooker and know of one other one that size as well.
So for the guys who have been to Hooker, the concensus is it's a numbers walleye lake?Any idea how long the camp sat vacant before Slate Falls acquired it?

Based on what I've read it looks like it closed in 2009/2010 due to some issue with the government? The last reference I could find was a report from July 2009. I believe the management of the lodge also transitioned in 2010.
I know some guys who moose hunted there two maybe three falls ago. Seven men and they shot seven moose.

We have fished Hooker since 2007 and haven't seen anyone at that camp ever. We go the last week of July and the 6 of us have caught thousands of Walleyes on Hooker & Vincent and haven't topped 26inches. Maybe earlier in the year would produce a bigger fish.Anyway it's a real fun lake system with lots of walleyes.
Is there another outpost on Hooker or Vincent other than Slate Falls?
